com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WTable.RowIdWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WTable.RowIdWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    WTable

    public static class WTable.RowIdWrapper
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Used to wrap the row index and the row key (used to uniquely identify the row).

    Intended for internal use only.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
